org.pepstock.charba.client.items

Class AnimationItem

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • org.pepstock.charba.client.commons.GenericJavaScriptObject
        • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.BaseItem
          • org.pepstock.charba.client.items.AnimationItem

  • public final class AnimationItem
extends BaseItem
    The onProgress and onComplete event are useful for synchronizing an external draw to the chart animation.
    This is the CHART.JS item with all needed info.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero
